articles.description: 16-year-old GM Nihal Sarin has a fantastic month of chess behind him. The Indian prodigy won two strong tournaments in a row in Serbia and gained 35 Elo points, reaching a virtual rating of 2655. How to watch?The games of the Silver Lake Open can be found her…

articles.title: MS Dhoni Birthday: Virat Kohli, Suresh Raina Lead Wishes As Former India Captain Turns 40 - NDTV Sports
articles.description: MS Dhoni Birthday: MS Dhoni turned 40 on Wednesday with wishes pouring in for former India captain on social media
